topic.title: Convergence
topic.body:
Convergence - is all the best taken from socialism and all the best taken from capitalism (all the worst is dropped).
Who and what want to keep from both systems?

topic.title: Is periodical prices decreasing possible?
topic.body:
We all know that there is inflation. Prices grow from year to year or even faster sometimes. Diff goods types prices grow with different speed, but grow anyway.

In USSR with Stalin government, prices for most required goods (food, clothes, home stuff etc) were being _decreased_ every year since 1947 up to 1953.

Is it possible to repeat? And how?

1_18GHRRFQYHNstG54GhC8cEgiPptdNkBr3c.body:
You forget USSR in Stalin times. Its growing was 15-20% and there was no unemployment. Working people were needed everywhere.
So, socialism and communism are the best for all people.
